message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product. I understand its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a great asset. I'm willing to part with it for $1,150,000.  Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value your interest, $950,000 is significantly below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down a bit further. I'm prepared to accept $1,050,000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value and our ongoing discussions. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to come down from your original price. However, $1,050,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,025,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the negotiations we've had so far.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and your willingness to compromise.  I'm prepared to meet you halfway on this one.  Let's close the deal at $1,037,500.  This would be a great price for both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $1,037,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,030,000, but no higher. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, and I respect that. I'm willing to make one final concession to reach an agreement.  I'm prepared to accept $1,035,000 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows us to close this deal.  Let's make this happen.

I appreciate your willingness to make a final concession, Alice. However, $1,035,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,025,000, but no higher. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.
